field.name: clients
field.label: Client ID(s)
field.description: Client ID of the pictures you wish this module to display. You can display multiple items by seperating the ids by a comma (,)

field.name: type
field.label: Display only
field.description: Type for displaying.**Image: Display only Banners which Image is slelected. **Custom Banner Code: Display only Banners which Custom Code is not empty. **Both: Display the Image of Banners, if it is not setted, display the Custom Code.

field.description: The width of the slide show (px)

field.description: The height of the slide show (px)

field.name: delay
field.label: Delay
field.description: Delay between banners change, in milliseconds (ie: 3000 = 3 seconds)

field.name: random
field.label: Random Display
field.description: An optional parameter specifying whether to 'randomize' the display order of the images
